lines.text: Have you ever had your bones scraped, Captain? It is painful in the extreme I can assure you.

[to Jackson]
A witness too frightened to talk is no witness at all.
Why is it these Occidentals indulge their vices the same way they run their lives, full of noise and vulgarity?
It's fortunate that they should choose to indulge in these vices. It gives us the opportunity to gratify them.
The police have been called in.
The police? The police have been ineffectual for the last hundred years, and will doubtless continue to be so.

[to Jackson as he fakes illness to pull a gun]
You underestimate the Oriental mind, Captain. The Chinese theater is the oldest in the world.
He that loves pleasure shall by pleasure fall.
